info.sourceTextContent:
CAPITULO XLVII.
De los pueblos Maigenos y Carcokies.
Entre otras cosas, supo el general, que la nacion de los indios Maigenos distaba cuatro dias de camino. Partimos รก buscarla, y nos recibieron de guerra, aunque procuramos la paz.
info.suspiciousTextContent:
Chapter XLVII: Concerning the indigenous tribes known as the Maigenos and the Carcokies.
The general was able to decipher the location of the Indian nation as being four days travel towards the tribe of the Maigenos. While all parties were currently embroiled in war, still we strove towards a just peace
